description.name: ethlinea
description.tagline: ETH Linea Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto linea-eth Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept ETH Linea directly on your website
Unique linea/eth receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your linea/eth wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
